overview:
As Chief Marketing Officer, Bryan leads the development of a best-in-class marketing organization to create demand for AtTaskâ€™s leading work management solutions. Bryan joined AtTask in 2011 and prior to his promotion to CMO, Bryan was the Vice President of Product for AtTask.

Bryan brings over 15 years of leadership experience in building and delivering solutions that solve big problems. Before joining AtTask, Bryan worked across start-ups, mid-size, and enterprise organizations; ranging from SaaS software pioneer Synchrony in the late 90’s to his most recent role at Microsoft, where he was responsible for leading the Worldwide Product Management and Product Marketing teams for the highly-successful Microsoft Dynamics CRM product and SaaS offering. With on-the-ground international experience in 30+ countries, and experience launching into 80+ countries, Bryan understands what is required to create and deliver solutions with global scale and impact. A charismatic and highly rated speaker, Bryan has delivered hundreds of presentations to worldwide audiences ranging from 30 to 30,000 people.

When he has free time from being an excellent dad, Bryan is an avid reader, and golfer.
